text: Just to Be Sure () is a 2017 French-Belgian comedy film directed by Carine Tardieu. It was screened in the Directors' Fortnight section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. It received two nominations at the 8th Magritte Awards. ==Cast== * François Damiens as Erwan Gourmelon * Cécile De France as Doctor Anna Levkine * Guy Marchand as Bastien Gourmelon * Perrette Souplex as Joseph Levkine * Alice de Lencquesaing as Juliette Gourmelon * Lyes Salem as Madjid * Brigitte Roüan as Cécile * Nadège Beausson-Diagne as The mother of the young girl ==Reception== On review aggregator Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 85%, based on 13 reviews with an average rating of 6.6/10. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 comedy- drama films Category:Belgian films Category:Belgian comedy-drama films Category:French films Category:French comedy-drama films Category:French- language films
title: Just to Be Sure
